languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 Agility, deals +300% damage, and scores guaranteed critical hits against prone targets.
When the cyber-eagle starts to {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soar{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a Toughness resistance test with a +20 bonus or be knocked prone.

traits.locale_text:
Cyber Eagle has +20 Agility and +300% Damage and always Crits against {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Prone{/g} targets.
Whenever Cyber Eagle {g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}Ascends{/g}, all adjacent enemies must succeed at Toughness (+20) or gain {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}Prone{/g}.

languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, deals +300% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and scores guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} targets.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or be knocked prone.
languages.original_text:
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и наносит на 300% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, а его попадания по {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутым{/g} целям являются {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическими{/g}.
Когда он поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, враги на соседних клетках выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +20 и в случае провала оказываются опрокинуты.

languages.text:
Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği kazanır. +%300 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilen{/g} hedeflere karşı saldırıları yüzde yüz {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirir.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında bitişiğindeki düşmanlar +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusa{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde yere devrilirler.

Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında bitişiğindeki düşmanlar +20 bonusa sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde yere devrilirler.

Siber kartal, +20 Çeviklik niteliği kazanır. +%300 daha fazla hasar verir ve yere devrilen hedeflere karşı saldırıları yüzde yüz kritik vuruş indirir.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında bitişiğindeki düşmanlar +20 bonusa sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde yere devrilirler.

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, inflige un +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional y asesta {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g} garantizados contra objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
Cuando la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 para no ser derribados.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, deals +300% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and scores guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} targets.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or be knocked prone.

traits.locale_text:
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de Agilidad, inflige un +300 % de daño adicional y asesta impactos críticos garantizados contra objetivos derribados.
Cuando la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una bonificación de +20 para no ser derribados.

La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, inflige un +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional y asesta {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g} garantizados contra objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
Cuando la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 para no ser derribados.

languages.text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高20点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高300%，攻击{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态的敌人时必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有邻近敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入倒地状态。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, deals +300% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and scores guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} targets.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or be knocked prone.

traits.locale_text:
生化猎鹰的敏捷提高20点，造成的伤害提高300%，攻击倒地状态的敌人时必定造成暴击。
当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有邻近敌人需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入倒地状态。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, verursacht +300 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und fügt {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckten{/g} Gegnern garantiert {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} zu.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, müssen Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 bestehen, um nicht hingestreckt zu werden.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, deals +300% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and scores guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} targets.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or be knocked prone.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 Beweglichkeit, verursacht +300 % Schaden und fügt hingestreckten Gegnern garantiert kritische Treffer zu.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, müssen Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht hingestreckt zu werden.

Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, verursacht +300 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und fügt {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckten{/g} Gegnern garantiert {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} zu.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, müssen Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 bestehen, um nicht hingestreckt zu werden.

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de +20, inflige +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires et inflige automatiquement des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} aux cibles sous l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet Paralysie.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, deals +300% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and scores guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} targets.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or be knocked prone.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'Agilité de +20, inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires et inflige automatiquement des coups critiques aux cibles sous l'effet Paralysie.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent l'effet Paralysie.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}+20され、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+300%上昇し、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}したターゲットに対して必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与える。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は+20の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると脆弱化する。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, deals +300% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and scores guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} targets.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or be knocked prone.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルは敏捷性+20され、与えるダメージが+300%上昇し、脆弱化したターゲットに対して必ずクリティカルヒットを与える。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は+20のボーナスで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると脆弱化する。

サイバーイーグルは敏捷性+20され、与えるダメージが+300%上昇し、脆弱化したターゲットに対して必ずクリティカルヒットを与える。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は+20のボーナスで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると脆弱化する。
